price: 惟后来悔过自新的人，〔将蒙赦宥〕，因为安拉确是至赦的，确是至慈的。
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
